name: Modie Shakarchi
bio: Modie Shakarchi is the lead researcher on the RAVEN project, focusing on the integration of robotics and virtual production. His work is centred on creating a seamless workflow between Unreal Engine 5 and ROS 2 to enable real-time, on-set robotic cinematography.

name: Xiaotian Dai
bio: Dr. Xiaotian Dai is the advisor of the RAVEN project, where his interest is to implement a low-latency workflow for RAVEN. He is an expert in real-time systems and model-based system engineering (MBSE).
